section.p: The pirate vessel crunches into your ship’s side. The attackers swarm aboard, screaming the war-cry that has struck terror into many brave hearts over the centuries. Your men square off grimly with hooks, belaying-pins and anything that comes to hand. They will die fighting rather than be enslaved.
